description: Detects execution of regsvr32 where the DLL is located in a potentially suspicious location.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Some installers might execute "regsvr32" with DLLs located in %TEMP% or in %PROGRAMDATA%. Apply additional filters if necessary.
name: Regsvr32 Execution From Potential Suspicious Location
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGSVR32.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\\ProgramData\\*" OR "*\:\\Temp\\*" OR "*\:\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\:\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Roaming\\*"))
